head.p: to: John from: Jane RE: research about the discrimination against African-Americans in the USA

p.s: I started to collect information from foreign news about the discrimination of African Americans in the USA.
The most helpful article was published in the German newspaper called Zeit Online and was written by Alexandra EndersEndres.
This newspaper is very neutral and has no political views.
In the first week of August 2014 an African American man was gunned down by a police officer.
The discrimination shows itself in several studies, that black people have a higher chance of being arrested than white people.
Black people have often times no good education, what leads to leaving school already after High School or college instead of going to universities.
And even if African American people are graduated they're often poor or don't get a job.

I really hope that I could help you with doing research in foreign news and if you'll find out more about discrimination by yourself, I recommend you to read the novel The Hate U Give by Angie Thomas.
